title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram - Pancha Loha Grandeur
materials: Crafted in Pancha Loha with a brilliant Hyderabadi polish. Features dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds (Dmq(-7):-13.50(514)) and oval-cut emeralds (SEme:-10.02(15)). Total gold weight (Gwt:-105.220(Fg)).
features: This stunning haaram showcases a floral motif, with each diamond-studded 'blossom' meticulously crafted. The vibrant green emeralds provide a captivating contrast, enhancing the brilliance of the diamonds. The graduated design ensures a flattering fit, cascading beautifully across the neckline.
colors: Primarily white (diamonds) and green (emeralds) against the subtle gold of Pancha Loha
creating a refreshing and elegant color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (vivahaalu)
and high-profile events. Makes a statement piece for Sangeet ceremonies and special celebrations.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional design and modern aesthetics. The exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality gemstones ensure enduring beauty and value. This haaram is a timeless treasure, perfect for creating a memorable impression.
